title: Graco Pack 'n Play with Reversible Napper & Changer at Bed Bath & Beyond

asset.author: Bed Bath & Beyond
asset.hookText:
http://www.bedbathandbeyond.com/product.asp?SKU=18704595
Observing a parent's instinct to cuddle and protect a newborn baby inspired the creation of the Pack 'n Play Playard with a Newborn Napper Station. This playard is designed to meet your child's needs as baby grows. Thanks for watching. Make sure to subscribe to the Bed Bath & Beyond YouTube Channel.

transcripts: Hi I'm Allison and I'm so excited to give you a sneak peek of the brand new and first ever play yard with napper and changer all in one. The pack and play with reversible napper and changer from Graco. First off, I love this pack in play because it grows with my child from infancy all the way up to the toddler stage. This new born napper station has soft fabrics that are sure to add an extra element of comfort for your baby. The changing table provides time saving convenience so you don't have to make a mad dash to the nursery for diaper changes. Best of all the changer features wipe clean fabric that makes cleanup a snap. And a secure attachment allows for a safe and simple switch from napper to changer and back again. It also has a removable full sized bassinet that provides an ideal spot for your infant to nap. The toy bar feature soft plush toys to amuse your little one while providing visual stimulation. Transitioning to toddler play yard mode is so easy and the airy mesh provides great ventilation. Plus the Graco signature push button fold makes closing your play yard quick and hassle free. There's even a convenient carrying bag for no fuss travel and storage included in your purchase. With the all new and first ever reversible napper and changer from Graco you can make the most out of your day. You and your baby will benefit greatly from the simple convenience of this wonderful new play yard designed with busy moms in mind.
